text: "Adult Education" is a 1984 song by Hall & Oates and is the second single from their 1983 album Rock 'n Soul Part 1. It went to number 7 in the Netherlands, number 8 in the United States, number 9 in Belgium, number 18 in Canada and number 63 in the United Kingdom. Category:1984 songs Category:Hall & Oates songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Adult Education (song)
